name: Darrow of Lykos
background: A Red miner who dreams of a better future for his people.
keyEvents: Works in the mines of Mars
Faces the oppression of the Golds

name: Eo
background: Darrow's wife and a passionate advocate for change.
keyEvents: Embodies the struggles of the Red class

name: Mustang (Virginia au Augustus)
background: An intelligent and ambitious Gold, granddaughter of a powerful leader.
keyEvents: Shows kindness and understanding towards Darrow

name: Sevro au Barca
background: A cunning and resourceful friend of Darrow.

name: Cassius au Bellona
background: A noble Gold who values honor and tradition.
keyEvents: Engages in dueling culture of Golds

name: The Jackal (Augustus au Rhea)
background: An ambitious and ruthless character in Gold society.
keyEvents: Shows cunning in his political maneuvers
Represents the darker side of Golds

name: Roque au Fabii
background: Darrow's friend known for his intelligence and loyalty.

name: Daxo au Telemanus
background: A loyal ally who supports Darrow's journey.

name: Aja au Grimmus
background: A formidable warrior and enforcer known for her skills.

name: Tactus au Rath
background: A Gold known for his hedonistic lifestyle and cunning.
keyEvents: Exploits his position for personal gain
Represents the excesses of Gold society

name: Octavia au Lune
background: The Sovereign of the Society and a powerful political figure.
keyEvents: Wields significant influence over Gold society

name: Ragnar Volarus
background: A strong Obsidian warrior with a sense of honor.
keyEvents: Represents the might of the Obsidian class
Demonstrates loyalty to those he respects

name: Harmony
background: A Gold leader known for her strategic mind and political influence.
keyEvents: Forms crucial alliances within the Golds

name: Ragnar Volarus
background: An Obsidian warrior with a strong sense of honor and loyalty.

name: Sefi au Nox
background: A fierce and capable Obsidian fighter with a complex past.
keyEvents: Struggles against the oppression of the Obsidian class
Fights for her ideals and family

name: Titus au Bellona
background: A Gold who often appears ruthless in his quest for power.

name: Sirius
background: A prominent Gold with ambitions to rise within the Society.
keyEvents: Influences the actions of other Golds

name: Nero au Rhea
background: A character known for his cunning and manipulative nature.

name: Darrow's Grandmother
background: A matriarch who represents the resilience of the Red class.
keyEvents: Embodies the struggles of her people

name: Eris au Bellona
background: A Gold known for her ambition and fierce loyalty to her family.
keyEvents: Plays a role in family dynamics and conflicts
Challenges the status quo among the Golds
